headline: TENNEY/LUNAIRE TEMPERATURE CHAMBER 100ºC
keywords: thermal thermal cycle environmental shock testing
categories.lvl1: Heating & Cooling > Environmental and Temperature Test Chambers
categories.lvl2: Heating & Cooling  >  Environmental and Temperature Test Chambers > Temperature Chambers
specstable:
Manufacturer Tenney
Model T5S5
Minimum Temperature -40 ºC (-40 ºF, 233.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 100 ºC (212 ºF, 373 ºK)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 1.000 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Interface RS 232
Capacity/Volume Box 5.00 cu ft (0.14 cu m)
Chamber Characteristics
Chamber Construction Stainless steel
Number of Shelves Provided 0
Viewing Window YES
Chamber Size
Width 22.00 in (55.88 cm)
Depth 20.00 in (50.80 cm)
Height 22.00 in (55.88 cm)
Refrigerant Type & Quantity R404A(non CFC), 12 lbs.
Other Information Transient:
Supply air temperature +75°Cto 0°C and vice versa at an average of 10°C per minute with (2) PCB
Instrumentation:
  • Watlow F4 256-step Programmable Controller with PID control and RTD sensor and
    cascade type control.
  • (2) Omega panel meters
  • TempGard high/low alarm
    Refrigeration Horsepower:
  • 5 HP scroll compressor with a water cooled condenser and accurately calibrated capillary
    expansion valve.
  • 5 GPM water at +20°C required
  • Alarm circuit is supplied to activate visual and audible alarms in the event of compressor trips.
    Heater Capacity:
  • 6 KW
    Airflow:
  • Vertical down(400 CFM)
    Features:
  • (2) access ports--(1) 2"W x 6"H(in left side wall), (1) 12"W x 2"H(in right side wall)
  • Both access ports have (1) LS-2 anti static foam plug
  • Urethane/fiberglass insulation
  • Logic to automatically select cooling when required
  • Hot refrigerant door mullion heating to retard condensation on door gasket
  • 2" steel swivel casters
  • 15" x 15" viewing window
  • Internal light with external switch
  • Door switch
  • (1) pair Model LBS-12-20 stainless steel sliding rails
  • (2) mounting bars left to right
Power Requirements 460 V 30.0 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 30.000 in (76.2 cm)
Depth 46.000 in (116.8 cm)
Height 90.000 in (228.6 cm)
Weight 900 lb (408 kg)
